original_text: When Pharaoh drew near, the people of Israel lifted up their eyes, and behold, the Egyptians were marching after them, and they feared greatly. And the people of Israel cried out to the Lord.
korean_text: 바로가 가까이 올 때에 이스라엘 자손이 눈을 들어 본즉 애굽 사람들이 자기들 뒤에 이른지라 이스라엘 자손이 심히 두려워하여 여호와께 부르짖고

sentences.original_text: the people of Israel lifted up their eyes,
the Egyptians were marching after them,
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 사람들이 그들의 뒤를 쫓아오고 있었고,

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel cried out to the Lord.
